summary: An email from attorney Bruce Barket requesting records of statements made by Mr. Tartaglione to the Bureau of Prisons regarding Jeffrey Epstein's reported attempted suicide in July 2019. The email is a formal legal request for documentation and recordings of those interviews.

persons.name: Bruce Barket
persons.context: Attorney sending a formal request for records of statements made by Mr. Tartaglione concerning Jeffrey Epstein's reported suicide attempt.

persons.name: Aida Leisenring
persons.context: Recipient of the email from Bruce Barket regarding the request for Mr. Tartaglione's statements.

persons.name: Mr. Tartaglione
persons.context: Was interviewed by the Bureau of Prisons concerning Jeffrey Epstein's reported attempted suicide in July 2019. The email requests records of his statements.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the reported attempted suicide attempt that Mr. Tartaglione was interviewed about.

connections.description: Barket is sending a legal request via email to Leisenring.
Barket, an attorney, is requesting records of statements made by Tartaglione, suggesting a legal interest or representation.
Tartaglione was interviewed concerning Epstein's reported suicide attempt, placing him as a potential witness to the event or its circumstances.

events.title: Epstein's Reported Suicide Attempt Interview
events.description: Mr. Tartaglione was interviewed by members of the Bureau of Prisons in the late hours concerning Jeffrey Epstein's reported attempted suicide attempt.

events.title: Legal Request for Interview Records
events.description: Attorney Bruce Barket sends an email formally requesting all records, written statements, and recordings of statements made by Mr. Tartaglione regarding the Epstein incident.

locations: Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP, 666 Old Country Road, Ste. 700, Garden City, NY 11530
keyFacts: Mr. Tartaglione was interviewed by the Bureau of Prisons regarding Jeffrey Epstein's reported attempted suicide on July 22-23, 2019.
Attorney Bruce Barket formally requested all records, written statements, and recordings of Mr. Tartaglione's statements about the incident.
The request was made via email on November 17, 2019, indicating ongoing legal inquiries into the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.
The correspondence is marked as potentially confidential attorney-client communication or privileged.
